preview.html: Buying figs in a dream. Many people search for the meaning of buying figs in a dream, and the interpretation of the fig represents a lot of money, and its tree shows a rich man with a lot of money, a useful person who fears the enemies of Islam, because the fig tree is the shelter of snakes and eating it indicates a large number of offspring, and interpreters believe Dreams that figs deserve praise because God Almighty respected them as He swore by them in the Qur’an, and some dream interpreters hated their interpretation and stated that it indicates worry and worry. Sadness, and some of them said: Figs are sadness and sadness for the one who eats them or suffers from them, and in this article we will explain buying figs in a dream through the site.various.figs in a dream. Seeing figs in a dream indicates many blessings that the dreamer enjoys, such as livelihood, money, and positive changes, But it is good for the dreamer to see it at the time of planting. If the dreamer sees the fruit of figs in the dream and the time of the dream is different from the date or time of planting the figs, then the vision confirms the dreamer’s sadness in the following days of his life for his partner. Buying figs in a dream Green figs symbolize the desires that It will come true in the dreamer’s life or the dreamers will hear a lot of good news. Buying figs in a dream if they are green in color, this indicates that the dreamer’s relatives on the trip will return to their homes and countries again. Buying figs in a dream The vision indicates that if the dreamer is absent, he will return to his land to continue his journey. His life on earth and in his home. Buying figs in a dream. Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing figs in dreams is a good thing and pointed to the source of livelihood that dreamers will soon earn without any effort. Read also: I dreamed that I was buying chocolate. Interpretation of figs in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen believes that if one sees a tree Figs in his dream, it means that he will earn a lot of money in the future. Buying figs in a dream In a dream and planting figs indicates that he will achieve many dreams and aspirations that he has sought throughout his life. Eating fresh figs or dried figs in a man’s dream indicates a cure for a disease And a lot of nutrition. Buying figs in a dream If a young man is single, this means that he will marry a relative of a girl with religious and moral morals. Buying figs in a dream The interpreters of the dream of buying figs explained that if one sees in his dream that he is buying figs, this means that he is escaping from problems and troubles. Which he suffered from, and this vision also shows the stability of life and prosperity from his money. Interpretation of the vision of figs by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that seeing figs in a dream has many benefits, which may indicate that the dreamer has acquired enormous rights to inheritance through permissible means. If you see a fig tree in your dream Growing in your home, this vision means a year of fertility and brings you many beautiful things. It indicates the marriage of unmarried people and the birth of married people, but if this person is afflicted with an illness, which means that the vision indicates recovery from the illness. Buying figs in a dream if you see a married woman She buys or eats figs, it means that she will soon become pregnant and enjoy a child. To see figs in the dream of an unmarried woman

title: Interpretation of swimming in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of swimming in a dream and its meaning in different situations. Swimming represents one of the most important sports activities that helps to gain physical ability, which allows practitioners the ability to better deal with the waves, whether at the beginning or in the middle of the beach. On the other hand, it is an ambiguous vision for the dreamer, and he does not know what the hints and symbols mean to him in reality. This vision is either praiseworthy or hateful to him, but it carries many different interpretations that differed between men and women, and in the encyclopedia you can see the opinions of dream interpreters about this dream. Swimming in a dream Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing swimming in a dream Ibn Sirin gave many interpretations of this dream In the case of swimming in the sea, this vision indicates goodness and food. It also indicates the acquisition of money if the dreamer finds pearls while swimming. But if the dreamer sees that he is drowning while swimming in the sea, especially in the winter, then this vision is repulsive to the dreamer and indicates a major problem for him in life. Reality. The interpretation of seeing swimming in a dream in the summer is an indication of the fulfillment of desires in reality, especially if the dreamer is swimming quickly. However, in the winter, this vision indicates illness or other crises in reality. In the case of diving and bathing in the sea, this vision suggests repentance and seeking forgiveness. Of sins or the arrival of relief and the removal of distress. If the dreamer dreams that he is swimming in the water with fish, then this vision in general is a sign of the satisfaction of desires and also indicates the marriage of a single person, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin also interpreted the dreamer who swims with his son in a dream as evidence of his appreciation For his responsibilities as a father in reality. In the case of seeing swimming with someone whom the dreamer does not already know, this vision indicates the noble qualities that the dreamer has, such as generosity. Interpretation of swimming in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. As for the interpretation of this vision by Imam Al-Nabulsi, it indicates obtaining a special job opportunity In the case of swimming in stagnant water. In the case of swimming in unclean water, this vision indicates that the dreamer is exposed to financial problems in reality. Swimming in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted swimming in a dream as a sign of success and achievement, whether academically or professionally. If the dreamer saw while swimming that he drowned or that the water was dirty, then this vision indicates his failure to achieve what he wants in reality. As for swimming in the pool, this vision indicates illness or a feeling of anxiety and tension about something in reality, and this vision could It also indicates a feeling of worry and anxiety in reality. A pool in Al-Osaimi’s dream. As for the interpretation of the meaning of this dream for Al-Osaimi, it was stated that in the case of swimming in clear water, this vision is a sign of success and success in work. If the dreamer sees that he is facing difficulties while swimming, then This vision indicates that the dreamer will face problems in reality. In the event that he falls into the pool and the dreamer is able to swim in it, this vision

title: Making bread in a dream for a pregnant woman

preview.html: But so as not to confuse you, dear reader, we will review together the interpretation of the vision of making bread according to its position on the gptafser.com/ website, so stay with us. Interpretation of the vision of making bread in a dream for a single girlWhen an unmarried girl dreams that she is making bread. It is a sign that she will marry someone close to her, She lives a quiet and stable life. But if he sees himself making bread and then eating it in the dream, then he has an unmarried girl. The meaning of the vision is the life through which she will travel and obtain many good things, God willing. If the unmarried girl is going through some difficulties and problems in her life and sees that she She was distributing bread to people in a dream. The vision suggests that she hears good news or experiences pleasant events through which her life will change, God willing. But if he sees that he is making bread and then gives it to a stranger, and he is happy with it in the dream. This may mean that there is someone in Her mind, and it is possible that there will be a strong bond or a successful marriage project. In her vision, she is making bread and distributing it to her fiancé’s family, if her fiancée had seen it in a dream. This vision can be considered a promising dream, because it indicates the consummation of the marriage between them gently and peacefully. See also: Seeing bread in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of watching bread making in a dream for a married woman. The dream of making bread in a married woman’s dream, especially if she feels tired and exhausted while doing it in the dream. Evidence that she is always seeking to please her husband and work for the comfort of her family. What if she was making bread and saw that Her husband was making it in a dream. It means that her husband is suffering with her and working for her comfort in all aspects of life. Eating bread after making it in a married woman’s dream. It indicates that there are a lot of good things that she will find in the next few days. But if the married woman Making dry bread in a dream. The vision indicates the wife’s serious lack of her household, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Making bread and then seeing it inedible in a married woman’s dream. It is one of the symbols that indicate the emergence of some problems and obstacles that this house will face, but with a request it will be answered. Elimination. Interpretation of the vision of making bread in a man’s dream and its meaning. If a married man sees that he is making bread in a dream, he may obtain goodness and great living. It can symbolize seeing bread after making it and then eating it in a married man’s dream. But there are many good things and an expansion in food that will bring, with permission. God is the crescent of the coming days. While if he saw himself making large quantities of fresh bread and distributing it to people in a dream. The vision showed that he is a good man and does many good deeds. When he makes bread, the married man gets up from the oven in which he makes bread in the dream. There will be some... Damage to it, but it will not be serious. Unripe bread in a dream made it in a married man’s dream. This means that he will face some difficulties that will face him in the next few days and he needs prayer. May God remove some damage and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Interpretation of Giving Bread in a dream is okay

title: Interpretation of seeing lions in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing the color black in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in their interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream, depending on the condition and circumstances of the viewer. If a man or woman is single, married or pregnant, and today through a vision site, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn. Kathir, Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream? Seeing the color black in a dream It indicates that the dreamer is going through a difficult time full of problems and feelings of anxiety and sadness. Seeing a black patient in a dream It indicates that his health will deteriorate in the near future. Vision The color black, and you are accustomed to using it in reality in a dream, indicates that the dreamer has many good things in his scientific and practical life. Seeing the black color of the dead in a dream indicates that the dreamer has repeatedly practiced many sins and disobedience in his life. Seeing animals in black in a dream indicates The viewer is exposed to envy a lot in his life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a white or red dress according to the color of the dream. What is Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream? Seeing a girl wearing a black outfit who was beautiful in the dream indicates that she is an independent girl with a strong personality and distinguished qualities. Seeing furniture A house painted black in a dream states that the viewer will travel outside his homeland in the near future. Seeing an insect painted black in a dream indicates that unpleasant things will happen to the fortuneteller. See also: Interpretation of seeing colors in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing the color black in a single woman’s dream? Seeing only black people in a dream The dream announces that she will achieve all her dreams and aspirations in her social and professional life. Seeing an unmarried woman wearing a black wedding dress in a dream expresses feelings of despair and frustration due to a failed love relationship. Seeing an unmarried woman in a room feeling black guilt in a dream indicates her distance from her family and original home and her feeling of sadness because of That. Seeing single people dyeing their hair black in a dream indicates that she will marry a good and well-to-do person. See also: Interpretation of seeing a wheel or a bicycle in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a black woman at home in a dream indicates that she thinks a lot There is something that occupies her mind and causes her anxiety and tension. Seeing a married woman wearing black in a dream indicates that God will bless her with food, goodness, and blessings for her and her family. Seeing a married woman with black curtains in a dream indicates many problems and arguments between her and her husband. Seeing a married woman wearing a black scarf in a dream appears She is a good woman and has the ability to perform all the tasks assigned to her to perfection. See also: Interpretation of seeing a black dress in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream

title: What is the interpretation of a woman in a dream?

preview.html: In the following article, we will explain to you the interpretation of a woman in a dream according to what was interpreted by the scholar Ibn Sirin. The world of dream interpretation is full of many associations that can bring goodness and joy to the dreamer's life and can bring harm, sadness and trouble at other times, and the scholars of interpretation have tried to clarify and interpret all dreams, and among these dreams is seeing a woman in a dream, the sleeper sees many women in his dream, and does not know the meaning of this vision, in our article about women in a dream Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of women in a dream Interpretation of women in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a woman in a dream is a good vision and indicates the arrival of kindness, great livelihood and happy news in the dreamer's life. If the sleeper dreams of women, this is a sign of the tightness of the situation and lack of money in his life in the coming period, and he will face many problems. If a man sees fat women in his dream, this is a sign of great goodness and wealth that he will acquire in the coming period. Seeing young women and young women in a dream is a good vision that indicates the removal of anxiety and the elimination of problems and worries. As for if the owner of the dream sees a beautiful woman smiling at him in a dream, this is a sign that God will give him money and enrich him after poverty. Seeing a blonde woman in a dream means that the sleeping owner will fall into disobedience And temptation. Seeing a group of women in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees a group of women in her dream, this is evidence of her prestigious position in society, and that God will grant her success in achieving great success, as long as she strives for it, and that she will gain prestige and status. Well done. Seeing a woman singing and dancing in an unmarried girl's dream is an unpleasant vision, as it indicates the sorrows and troubles that will appear in the girl's life in the coming period. If an unmarried girl dreams of a gynecologist, this is a sign that she is going through a bad psychological state and a bad mood and that God will help her overcome this condition. If an unmarried girl dreams that a woman is wearing white in a dream, this is a sign that her engagement or marriage is approaching. Seeing a group of women in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees fat women in her dream, this is a sign that joy, happy news and great wealth will come to her life in the near future. As for seeing a thin woman in a married woman's dream, it indicates the coming of sorrows and a lack of supplies in her life. If a married woman dreams of a single woman, this is a sign that there is a girl in her life and this girl hates her intensely and wants to harm her. Seeing many women performing the obligatory prayer in a married woman's dream is a good vision that indicates the coming of stability and joy in her life and that she has a happy life with her husband. And when she sees a gynecologist in a married woman's dream, this is a sign that she is an intelligent woman She can deal with people wisely. Seeing an unknown woman in a dream for a man If a man sees in a dream a beautiful unknown woman and this man is single, this is a sign of his marriage to

And status. Well done. If a married woman sees fat women in her dream, this is a sign that joy and news Happiness and great wealth will come to her life in the near future. As for seeing a thin woman in a married woman’s dream, it indicates the coming of sorrows and lack of supplies in her life. And when you see a gynecologist in a married woman’s dream, this is a sign that she is a very intelligent woman who can deal with people wisely. Vision The unknown woman in a man’s dream: If a man sees in a dream a beautiful, unknown woman and this man is single, then this is a sign of his marriage to her.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cat in a dream

preview.html: In the following article, we show you the interpretation of a dream about seeing a cat in a dream, according to what was interpreted by Imam Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of this is a vision and they do not know what its meaning is. Dream interpretation scholars said that the interpretation of a dream about a cat varies according to the condition of the sleeper, as it differs according to the shape of the cat. The cat that came to him in a dream, and in the following paragraphs we present to you through the interpretive encyclopedia of seeing a cat in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cat in a dream Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a male cat in a dream is not a good vision and indicates the presence of traitors in the life of the dreamer. The cat indicates A male in a dream also indicates bad luck in life and the inability to achieve dreams. As for a white cat in a dream, it indicates the good news that the dreamer will receive, and it also indicates success and superiority. A white cat in a dream also indicates the presence of loyal friends in the sleeper’s life. Hearing the sound of cats in a dream indicates that God will help the dreamer achieve his goals in life. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is selling cats, this is a sign that he will face a major financial loss. Seeing eating cat meat in a dream means that the dreamer is following magic. If The dreamer saw in a dream that he was killing a black cat, so this is a sign that he will get rid of haters and envious people in his life. Interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin said that seeing a cat in a dream indicates gossip, gossip, and bad morals. Seeing cats in a dream also indicates To the presence of hypocrites in the sleeper's life. And if the sleeper sees in his sleep a cat giving birth to many kittens, this is a sign that great sustenance and kindness will come to him in his coming days, but sometimes this vision indicates the presence of magic and envy. The life of the sleeper is committed to reading the Holy Qur’an and fortifying the house of his demons. Interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that a cat in a man’s or woman’s dream indicates the presence of betrayal between spouses, as well as the presence of cunning in the life of the dreamer. Seeing cats in a dream sometimes indicates the presence of a quarrel. Between people or the divorce of spouses. A black cat in a dream indicates the presence of people trying to harm the dreamer. Seeing black cats sometimes indicates the presence of someone trying to harm the sleeper with magic, so it is necessary to take into account the recitation of dhikr and the protection of the verses of God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream For a single woman, Ibn Sirin believes that the presence of a cat in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the presence of some evil people in her life. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that a cat is attacking her, this indicates the presence of someone who is trying to harm and harm her. If a single girl dreams of a black cat, this is a sign of The presence of a person in her life who is jealous of her, and this vision may indicate that she has deceived those around her. A white cat in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the presence of goodness in her life. If she sees cats, this is a sign that good news will come to her in the coming days. And seeing an unmarried girl A married woman in her dream running away from cats is evidence of her fear of the future and her deep anxiety

title: I dreamed that my husband was a groom when I was married

preview.html: I dreamed that he was a groom and that I was married. It may be a bit strange for a married woman to dream that the groom came to propose to her, but in fact it is one of the dreams that we have searched for a lot through the Google search engine recently, which prompted us to search for its interpretation. As opinions differed about this dream, but we will mainly rely on the interpretation of the scholar, jurist and Muslim interpreter of dreams Ibn Sirin to clarify and interpret the dream in which I dreamed that he was a groom and I was married. Jenny’s dream is a groom and I am married. Recently, the title of the research “I dreamed that he was a groom and I am married” has spread across Google search engine and various social media platforms, and this is the desire of many women to know the interpretation of this strange dream, which is what Ibn Sirin interpreted as follows: It indicates a good situation and a change in the woman’s circumstances for the better. A sign of contentment, love and friendship between her and her husband. Good news. That one of her children gets married if they are of marriageable age. Evidence of her intense love for her husband. Jenny’s dream is of the groom and I am single. As for an unmarried woman or girl who has never been married, if she dreams that the groom comes to her and proposes marriage to her in a dream, this means the following: Evidence of That she will marry the man she loves. The presence of money or health problems in the future. The proximity of her marriage to a good, handsome man. My dream is that of the groom and I am pregnant. In the event that you are pregnant and dream that someone is your son-in-law or betrothed to you, many interpreters, led by Ibn Sirin, said that This often symbolizes the following things: An indication that the birth will be easy and accessible without pain. It indicates the health of the baby and that it will be fine. If there is no festive appearance, she will give birth to a boy, but if she is wearing a dress, she will give birth to a girl. It should be noted Until Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream that the groom and I are married refers in its entirety to goodness and righteousness, which is directly related to the righteousness and justice of the marital relationship between the spouses. Current woman. And her husband.

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Rahman in a dream

preview.html: Surat Al-Rahman in a dream There is no doubt that the Holy Qur’an brings psychological comfort and a safe haven for everyone with its words. It is a guide for every confused person and a comfort for every patient. Therefore, we find that all surahs have clear meanings from God Almighty to His servants, so when you see Surah Al-Rahman in a dream, there are many connotations and meanings that you will understand by following this article. What is the interpretation of Surah Al-Rahman in a dream? The dream interpretation of Surah Al-Rahman indicates that the dreamer is far from any meaning. Problems or sadness may live with him in his life. It also indicates the necessity of staying away from falsehood so that he does not fall into the forbidden things that make him hated by his Lord. Therefore, it is necessary to choose the path of truth and honesty in order to be among those whom God (Almighty and Majestic) has blessed. High) in his afterlife. If the dreamer sees that he repeats it and memorizes it in the dream, then this represents a pilgrimage to the House of God soon. This also indicates that he teaches the correct religion to everyone around him without just keeping the knowledge. Also, the vision is an explanation of the dreamer’s protection from any enemy that may lead With him to perdition, he lives with kindness and happiness from his Lord. It is also an expression of the expansion of his work as a result of the enormous provision that his Lord has provided him, as he receives blessings and favor from the Lord of the Worlds. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Rahman by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin tells us that this vision indicates the sincerity of this dreamer His ability to memorize the Book of God Almighty and read it constantly while seeking to understand its meanings and meditate on its meanings to know everything around him. It also indicates that he seeks to repent from any sin he commits on an ongoing basis because he fears the wrath of his Lord upon him, and he seeks purity before Him during his death, and to be free from mistakes and transgressions. When you see him reading the surah or some verses from it, this indicates the breadth of his work as he works with these meanings in His life, he is a good person in society. Perhaps it is evidence that the dreamer constantly praises his Lord for everything He has given him in his life, because he appreciates all the blessings that he enjoys thanks to his Lord and His provision for him. Interpretation of a dream about Surah Al-Rahman by Ibn SirinInterpretation of dreams by Imam Al-Sadiq Surah Al-RahmanImam Al-Sadiq explains to us Seeing Surat Al-Rahman in a dream is a clear expression of God’s many blessings upon the dreamer. It also indicates that it is a great mercy upon him in the afterlife, and protection from Hell, because he performs a beneficial act that places him in a high rank with his Lord, and makes him abstain from sins. What is the interpretation? Reading Surat Al-Rahman in a dream by Ibn Shaheen? Ibn Shaheen assures us that the vision indicates the presence of some pursuers of the dreamer, as he is surrounded by many enemies and haters in his life, but they cannot harm him no matter what they do and how much they try. This is due to God’s interest in him. The dream also indicates that the dreamer will soon go for Hajj or Umrah and that he will remain there to worship his Lord. If the dreamer sees this dream and complains of any pain, then his vision expresses his liberation from all the fatigue and pain that he feels. Perhaps it is a clear indication of His response to His Lord is with all His supplications that He constantly calls upon Him. Interpretation of reading Surah Ar-Rahman in a dream according to Nabulsi: Sheikh Nabulsi will mention several important meanings that this dream clarifies, which are: to achieve all the goals that he seeks and wants so badly. Al-Dali

Al-Dali

title: The 50 most important interpretations of a dream about a man’s long hair by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a man: Seeing long hair is a favorite thing for many people and in the world of dreams, if you see a man with long hair, you will wonder about the meaning of this dream and whether it is praiseworthy or not, so we got different opinions from interpreters on this topic and everything related to it, such as hair. Long, straight or curly hair, or if the owner of the hair is bald or dead, etc. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a man. The jurists said that the interpretation of a dream about long hair for a man has good connotations and other connotations that may lead to undesirable things, and below we mention the most important of them: If A person dreams of shaving his head during Hajj, then this is a sign of returning to God and repenting from committing sins. If a man dreams that he is shaving his head in the holy months, this is a sign that he will pay his debts and feel peace because of that. When a man sees during his sleep that his hair is long, this leads to To goodness, benefit, and blessing in all aspects of his life, except for longevity, a feeling of peace and joy, and earning a lot of money. Seeing long hair in a man’s dream symbolizes the justice, greatness, and prestige that he enjoys. The longer the man’s hair in a dream, the greater his knowledge of his religion and the events around him. His dominance and status among the people increased. If a merchant sees long hair in his dream, this is a sign of blessing and abundance. Go to Google and type the dream interpretation site on the Internet and you will find all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a man by Ibn Sirin. Learn with us the most important interpretations mentioned by the scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin. In a dream of a man with long hair: Seeing a man’s long hair in a dream symbolizes that he will face a lot of trouble and feel sadness, anguish, and distress. If a man dreams of long, heavy hair, this will lead to negative changes in his life that will make him burdened with debt and depression after he becomes wealthy and gets what he wants. If a man is married and sees long hair in his dream, this leads to instability in his relationship with his life partner. If an employee sees long hair in a dream, this indicates that he does not feel comfortable in his job. A man’s long hair during sleep indicates illness and a bad psychological state. A man’s dream that a lock of his hair has grown in length means that the problems he will face in the coming period will be due to a malicious woman manipulating him. When a man sees in a dream that there is long hair on the right side of his head, this symbolizes that God - Glory be to Him - will give him male children, Or if it is on the left side, it means that they will be female. Long hair in a dream for a man Imam Al-Sadiq One ​​of the interpretations of Sheikh Al-Sadiq’s long hair in a dream for a man is that when he sees in a dream a man who has not had children since his hair is long, this is evidence that the Creator will grant him good offspring. In the near future. Long hair in a man’s dream means that he is an honest person and is characterized by honesty, sincerity, honesty and openness, which makes him popular with people. Seeing long hair in a man’s dream also indicates that he is a social person who provides help to others without any purpose of and
